sections.PROJECT:
: Operation and maintenance of gas compressor. 
 
 Designation 
: Instrumentation technician. 
 Working Period 
: From 5/01/2015 to 14/01/2017 
 
 Job Responsibilities: 
 
 Calibration of various instruments like pressure gauge, pressure transmitter, pressure switch, 
pneumatic controller. 
 Maintain, repair of logic control system used in gas compressor plant. 
 
 Checking and stop all types of pump according to the case of emergency. 
 Connection of various field instruments from hazardous area to control panel. 
 Maintain daily progress report. 
 
Apprenticeship Certificate: One year apprenticeship training in Indian Oil Corporation limited.
